VEHICLE_STATUS.description: DATA ON THE STATUS OF A VEHICLE

EVENTS.description: DATA REGARDING THE EVENTS OF YOUR VEHICLE.

CD_CONTRACT.description: INFORMATION ABOUT THE CONNECTEDDRIVE CONTRACT DETAILS.

vehicle.drivetrain.batteryManagement.bat.name: High-voltage battery size
vehicle.drivetrain.batteryManagement.bat.description: This value indicates the size of the installed high-voltage battery.

vehicle.vehicle.antiTheftAlarmSystem.ala.name: AntiTheftAlarm activation time
vehicle.vehicle.antiTheftAlarmSystem.ala.description: Timestamp of the last alarm activation time. The value comes without timezone information.

vehicle.vehicle.antiTheftAlarmSystem.ala.name: AntiTheftAlarm is on
vehicle.vehicle.antiTheftAlarmSystem.ala.description: Anti theft alarm is active (car is honking).

vehicle.channel.teleservice.status.name: Availability of teleservices
vehicle.channel.teleservice.status.description: This value indicates whether teleservices are available for this vehicle.

vehicle.electricalSystem.battery.voltage.name: Battery voltage
vehicle.electricalSystem.battery.voltage.description:
The value indicates the current battery voltage in the vehicle's electrical system. 
This value is always given in voltage, e.g. 14.4 V.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging profile
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: The charging profile provides information about the charging mode most recently selected for your vehicle. Where appropriate, CarData element may also be used to display individual attributes in cars without an electric drive, e.g. the preconditioning settings.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.range: The XML structure is appended at the end of the table (1).

vehicle.cabin.convertible.roofRetractabl.name: Convertible roof status
vehicle.cabin.convertible.roofRetractabl.description: Convertible Roof Retractable State. BMW Mini vehicles have the additionally option to only open the folding roof. This signal represents the Mini folding roof state. It should be read together with the convertible roof state as well, see Vehicle.Cabin.Convertible.RoofStatus.

vehicle.drivetrain.internalCombustionEng.name: Coolant temperature
vehicle.drivetrain.internalCombustionEng.description: The value indicates the current coolant temperature in degrees centigrade or Fahrenheit at the time of data collection.

vehicle.channel.ngtp.timeVehicle.name: Date and time in vehicle
vehicle.channel.ngtp.timeVehicle.description: These values indicate the time shown in the vehicle at the time of recording the data.

vehicle.status.serviceTime.inspectionDat.name: Date of next inspection
vehicle.status.serviceTime.inspectionDat.description:
This value indicates when the next inspection is due. 
A date will be shown respectively, for example 30.09.2018 23:00 UTC or 09.30.2018 23:00 UTC.
vehicle.status.serviceTime.inspectionDat.range:
dd.mm.yyyy hh:mm UTC
or
mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm UTC

vehicle.vehicle.deepSleepModeActive.name: Deep Sleep Mode
vehicle.vehicle.deepSleepModeActive.description:
This value indicates whether Deep Sleep Mode is activated (“true”) or deactivated (“false”) at the time of the request.
If the customer has activated Deep Sleep Mode, the vehicle can be parked for a longer time without charging the battery. In this mode, most consumers are deactivated to save energy. The customer can end Deep Sleep Mode by deactivating it or starting the vehicle.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default front driver seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for front driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default front driver seat heating
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for front driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default front passenger seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for front passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default front passenger seat heating
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for front passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default rear driver seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for rear driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default rear driver seat heating
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for rear driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default rear passenger seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for rear passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default rear passenger seat heating
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for rear passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default steering wheel heating
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for steering wheel heating for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default third row driver seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for third row driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default third row driver seat heating
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for third row driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default third row passenger seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for third row passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Default third row passenger seat heating
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for third row passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Direct start target temp
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for target temperature for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.displayUnit.d.name: Display unit of instrument panel in vehicle
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.displayUnit.d.description: This value indicates the units (kilometres or miles) in which distances are indicated on the vehicle instrument panel.

vehicle.status.serviceDistance.yellow.name: Distance threshold for service information
vehicle.status.serviceDistance.yellow.description:
The static value indicated is stored in the vehicle and indicates the first time that the customer receives a mileage-related message to inform him that the vehicle will soon be due for a service. 
It is given in kilometres or miles (for example 2000 km or 1243 mi).

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.de.name: Distance to navigation destination
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.de.description:
This value indicates the distance to the active navigation destination in kilometres or miles at the time of data collection. 
The values range from 0 km to 100000 km or from 0mi to 62137mi.
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.de.range:
0 km to 100000 km
or
0 mi to 62137 mi

vehicle.status.serviceDistance.next.name: Distance to the next service
vehicle.status.serviceDistance.next.description:
This value indicates how many kilometres or miles remain before the next service at the time of recording the data. 
Note: This value is calculated based on the individual CBS scopes and is not determined with every data transfer.
For more details, see "Condition Based Service".
vehicle.status.serviceDistance.next.range:
0 km to 100,000 km
or
0 mi to 62,137 mi

vehicle.cabin.door.status.name: Door status
vehicle.cabin.door.status.description:
This value indicates the status of the doors, but is only sporadically recorded and transmitted. 
Note: It is recommended to use only the individual door status instead of this value.
vehicle.cabin.door.status.range:
oldDoorStatus: ASN_secured
ASN_unlocked
ASN_unknown
ASN_selective-Locked

newDoorStatus:
ASN_locked
ASN_unlocked
ASN_selective-Locked
ASN_unknown

allDoorsLocked:
ASN_isUnknown
ASN_isTrue
ASN_isFalse

trunkLocked:
ASN_isUnknown
ASN_isTrue
ASN_isFalse

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.name: Exterior mirror heating active
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.description: Current status of the exterior mirror heating.

vehicle.electronicControlUnit.diagnostic.name: Fault memory
vehicle.electronicControlUnit.diagnostic.description: The fault memory provides information about potential errors or technical faults in the vehicle. This information is intended for workshops. Customer-relevant errors that are displayed to the driver in the vehicle can be found under the CarData Element “Check control messages”. Details about this are documented in the operating manual of the vehicle.
vehicle.electronicControlUnit.diagnostic.range: The JSON structure is appended at the end of the table (4).

vehicle.cabin.door.row1.driver.position.name: Front driver door position
vehicle.cabin.door.row1.driver.position.description: Driver-side front door opening position in percent. 0% represents fully closed and 100% represents fully opened.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.driverSide.cooli.name: Front driver seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.driverSide.cooli.description: Front driver seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Front driver seat direct cool
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for front driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Front driver seat direct heat
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for front driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.driverSide.heati.name: Front driver seat heating
vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.driverSide.heati.description: Front driver seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Front passenger direct cool
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for front passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Front passenger direct heat
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for front passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.door.row1.passenger.positi.name: Front passenger door position
vehicle.cabin.door.row1.passenger.positi.description: Passenger-side front door opening position in percent. 0% represents fully closed and 100% represents fully opened.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.passengerSide.co.name: Front passenger seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.passengerSide.co.description: Front passenger seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.passengerSide.he.name: Front passenger seat heating
vehicle.cabin.seat.row1.passengerSide.he.description: Front passenger seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.statusAirPurification.name: HVAC air purification status
vehicle.cabin.hvac.statusAirPurification.description: Actual status of the air purification.

vehicle.electricalSystem.battery.stateOf.name: Low-voltage battery
vehicle.electricalSystem.battery.stateOf.description: The value indicates the state of charge of the low-voltage battery in percent measured at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.po.name: Maximum number of POIs stored in the navigation system
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.po.description: This value indicates how many POIs (points of interest) can be stored in the navigation system.

vehicle.vehicle.travelledDistance.name: Mileage
vehicle.vehicle.travelledDistance.description: The value indicates the current mileage at the time of data collection.
vehicle.vehicle.travelledDistance.range:
0 km to 500000 km
or
0 mi to 310686 mi

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.isMobilePhone.name: Mobile phone connection
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.isMobilePhone.description: This value indicates whether a mobile phone was linked to the vehicle at the time of data collection or whether the connection status is unknown.

vehicle.isMoving.name: Motion status of the vehicle
vehicle.isMoving.description: This value indicates whether the vehicle was in motion at the time of data collection.

vehicle.status.conditionBasedServicesCou.name: Number of CBS reports
vehicle.status.conditionBasedServicesCou.description: The value specifies the maximum number of service notifications transmitted from the vehicle to BMW via telematics. The actual number of service notifications transmitted (see separate CBS key) varies depending on how the vehicle is used and whether relevant thresholds have been reached. Note: Not all Condition Based service messages which occur in the vehicle are also transferred.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.po.name: Number of free POI spaces in navigation system
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.po.description: This value indicates how many POIs (points of interest) are still open in the navigation system.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.name: Orientation of the vehicle
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.description: This value indicates the orientation of the vehicle in degrees at the time of data collection. If the value is 180, the vehicle is pointing directly south. If the value is 0, the vehicle is pointing directly north. The values thus range from 0 to 359. The determined orientation of the vehicle may differ from its actual orientation due to inaccuracies in the GPS positioning.

vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.isRemote.name: Permission to use the engine for pre-conditioning
vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.isRemote.description: This value indicated whether permission was granted to use the engine for the pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning at the time of data collection. This is determined by the customer.

vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.activity.name: Pre-conditioning status of the stationary air conditioning
vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.activity.description: Current status of the pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning before commencing travel at the time of data collection. The value “Inactive” may be transmitted if the pre-conditioning has not been booked or if the pre-conditioning is not active at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.name: Preconditioning comfort state
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.description: Status of the comfort state of the climate preconditioning.
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.range: NOT_ACTIVE, COMFORT_HEATING, COMFORT_COOLING, COMFORT_VENTILATION, DEFROST, COMFORT_UNDEFINED

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.name: Preconditioning progress
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.description: Progress of the currently active climate preconditioning in percent.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.name: Preconditioning remaining time
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.description: Remaining runtime of climate preconditioning in seconds.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.name: Rear defrost active
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.statu.description: Current status of the rear window heating.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Rear driver direct cool
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for rear driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Rear driver direct heat
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for rear driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.door.row2.driver.position.name: Rear driver door position
vehicle.cabin.door.row2.driver.position.description: Driver-side rear door opening position in percent. 0% represents fully closed and 100% represents fully opened.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.driverSide.cooli.name: Rear driver seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.driverSide.cooli.description: Rear driver seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.driverSide.heati.name: Rear driver seat heating
vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.driverSide.heati.description: Rear driver seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Rear passenger direct cool
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for rear passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Rear passenger direct heat
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for rear passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.door.row2.passenger.positi.name: Rear passenger door position
vehicle.cabin.door.row2.passenger.positi.description: Passenger-side rear door opening position in percent. 0% represents fully closed and 100% represents fully opened.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.passengerSide.co.name: Rear passenger seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.passengerSide.co.description: Rear passenger seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.passengerSide.he.name: Rear passenger seat heating
vehicle.cabin.seat.row2.passengerSide.he.description: Rear passenger seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.body.trunk.window.isOpen.name: Rear window unlocking
vehicle.body.trunk.window.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the rear window is unlocked (TRUE) or closed (FALSE).

vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.error.name: Reason for not carrying out pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning
vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.error.description: Reason for not carrying out pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning at the time of data collection.
vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.error.range:
LowFuel,
LowBattery,
QuotaExceeded,
HeaterFailure,
ComponentFailure,
OpenOrUnlocked,
OK,
INVALID

vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.remainin.name: Remaining duration of pre-conditioning
vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.remainin.description: This value indicates the remaining duration for the pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning in minutes at the time of data collection. This value may also be transmitted if the pre-conditioning has not been booked or if the pre-conditioning status of the stationary air conditioning is not active (“inactive”) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.re.name: Remaining range
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.re.description: This value indicates the remaining range of fuel in kilometres or miles at the time of data collection.
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.re.range:
0 km to 100000 km
or
0 mi to 62137 mi

vehicle.drivetrain.engine.isActive.name: State of ignition
vehicle.drivetrain.engine.isActive.description: This value indicates whether the ignition was on or off at the time of data collection or whether the status is unknown.

vehicle.body.trunk.isOpen.name: Status of boot lid
vehicle.body.trunk.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the boot lid was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.convertible.roofStatus.name: Status of convertible roof
vehicle.cabin.convertible.roofStatus.description:
Indicates the current status of the convertible roof at the time of data collection, e.g. whether it was closed (CLOSED), open (OPEN) or – in an emergency – locked (EMERGENCYLOCKED). 
The following additional status values are possible: 
CLOSEDSECURED = convertible roof closed, vehicle secured 
OPENSECURED = convertible roof open, vehicle secured 
HARDTOPMOUNTED = hard top mounted and closed (removable hard top) 
INTERMEDIATEPOSITION = convertible roof in intermediate position 
LOADINGPOSITION = roof is in a position that allows for easy loading of the boot 
LOADINGPOSITIONIMMEDIATE = roof is in a position that allows for easy loading of the boot

vehicle.drivetrain.engine.isIgnitionOn.name: Status of engine (on/off)
vehicle.drivetrain.engine.isIgnitionOn.description: This value indicates whether the engine was on or off at the time of data collection or whether the status is unknown.

vehicle.cabin.door.row1.driver.isOpen.name: Status of front left door
vehicle.cabin.door.row1.driver.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the front left door was closed at the time of data collection (CLOSED) or open (OPEN).

vehicle.cabin.window.row1.driver.status.name: Status of front left window
vehicle.cabin.window.row1.driver.status.description: This value indicates whether the front left window was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.door.row1.passenger.isOpen.name: Status of front right door
vehicle.cabin.door.row1.passenger.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the front right door was closed at the time of data collection (CLOSED) or open (OPEN).

vehicle.cabin.window.row1.passenger.stat.name: Status of front right window
vehicle.cabin.window.row1.passenger.stat.description: This value indicates whether the front right window was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.body.hood.isOpen.name: Status of hood
vehicle.body.hood.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the vehicle's hood was closed at the time of data collection (CLOSED) or open (OPEN).

vehicle.body.lights.isRunningOn.name: Status of lights
vehicle.body.lights.isRunningOn.description: This value indicates whether the vehicle light was on or off at the time of data collection or whether the status is unknown.

vehicle.cabin.door.row2.driver.isOpen.name: Status of rear left door
vehicle.cabin.door.row2.driver.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the rear left door was closed at the time of data collection (CLOSED) or open (OPEN).

vehicle.cabin.window.row2.driver.status.name: Status of rear left window
vehicle.cabin.window.row2.driver.status.description: This value indicates whether the rear left window was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.door.row2.passenger.isOpen.name: Status of rear right door
vehicle.cabin.door.row2.passenger.isOpen.description: This value indicates whether the rear right door was closed at the time of data collection (CLOSED) or open (OPEN).

vehicle.cabin.window.row2.passenger.stat.name: Status of rear right window
vehicle.cabin.window.row2.passenger.stat.description: This value indicates whether the rear right window was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.sunroof.status.name: Status of sunroof
vehicle.cabin.sunroof.status.description: This value indicates whether the sunroof (if the vehicle has one) was open (OPEN), half-open (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Steering wheel direct heat
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for steering wheel heating for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.steeringWheel.heating.name: Steering wheel heating
vehicle.cabin.steeringWheel.heating.description: Actual value of the steering wheel heating in percent.

vehicle.cabin.sunroof.overallStatus.name: Sunroof overall status
vehicle.cabin.sunroof.overallStatus.description: Overall status of the vehicle's sunroof.

vehicle.cabin.sunroof.relativePosition.name: Sunroof relative position
vehicle.cabin.sunroof.relativePosition.description: Openingt state of the sunroof in percent. -100 means full tilt position. 0% represents fully closed and 100% represents fully opened.

vehicle.cabin.sunroof.shade.position.name: Sunshade position
vehicle.cabin.sunroof.shade.position.description: Item position. 0 = Start position 100 = End position.

vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.remainingF.name: Tank content
vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.remainingF.description: The value indicates the current fuel tank level in litres or gallons at the time of data collection. Depending on the position of the tank float, the specified value may differ by up to 6 litres or 1.6 gallons.
vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.remainingF.range:
0 L to 100 L
or
0 gal to 26.5 gal

vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.level.name: Tank level in %
vehicle.drivetrain.fuelSystem.level.description: This value indicates the tank level in percent at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Target temperature
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: Default settings for target temperature for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Third row driver direct cool
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for third row driver seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Third row driver direct heat
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for third row driver seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.driverSide.cooli.name: Third row driver seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.driverSide.cooli.description: Third row driver seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.driverSide.heati.name: Third row driver seat heating
vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.driverSide.heati.description: Third row driver seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Third row passenger direct cool
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for third row passenger seat cooling/ventilation of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.name: Third row passenger direct heat
vehicle.cabin.hvac.preconditioning.confi.description: DirectStart settings for third row passenger seat heating of the seat for climate preconditioning.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.passengerSide.co.name: Third row passenger seat cooling
vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.passengerSide.co.description: Third row passenger seat Cooling. 0 = off. +100 = max cold.

vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.passengerSide.he.name: Third row passenger seat heating
vehicle.cabin.seat.row3.passengerSide.he.description: Third row passenger seat heating. 0 = off. +100 = max heat.

vehicle.cabin.sunroof.tiltStatus.name: Tilting status of sunroof
vehicle.cabin.sunroof.tiltStatus.description: This value indicates whether the sunroof (if the vehicle has one) was tilted (OPEN), half-tilted (INTERMEDIATE) or closed (CLOSED) at the time of data collection.

vehicle.status.serviceTime.hUandAuServic.name: Time threshold for main and exhaust gas inspection
vehicle.status.serviceTime.hUandAuServic.description: The threshold indicates how many months before the main and exhaust gas inspection is due the service advisor will be notified.

vehicle.status.serviceTime.yellow.name: Time threshold for service information
vehicle.status.serviceTime.yellow.description:
The static value indicated is stored in the vehicle and indicates the first time that the customer receives a message to inform them that the vehicle will soon be due for a service. 
This is given in weeks (for example 4).

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.de.name: Time to the navigation destination
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.de.description: This value indicates the arrival time at the navigation destination and is given in hours and minutes.

vehicle.vehicle.timeSetting.name: Time zone setting in the vehicle
vehicle.vehicle.timeSetting.description: This value indicates the current setting for the time display in the vehicle at the time of data collection. For example, this may be winter time, summer time, UTC or manual.

vehicle.body.trunk.isLocked.name: Trunk locked status
vehicle.body.trunk.isLocked.description: Indicated weather the trunk is locked or not.

vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.isRemote.name: Use of engine for pre-conditioning
vehicle.vehicle.preConditioning.isRemote.description: This value indicates whether the engine was active during pre-conditioning of the stationary air conditioning at the time of data collection. The value “Inactive” may be transmitted if the pre-conditioning has not been booked or if the pre-conditioning is not active at the time of data collection.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.name: Vehicle altitude
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.description:
This value indicates the height of the vehicle above sea-level at the time of data collection. 
The value range reaches from -100m to 6000m or from -328ft to 19685ft.
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.range:
-100 m to 6000 m
or
-328 ft to 19685 ft
or -NA-

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.name: Vehicle position – degree of latitude
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.description:
This value indicates the degree of latitude at which the vehicle was at the time of data collection. 
The degree of latitude could range from 0 (at the equator) to a maximum of +90 in the northern hemisphere or respectively -90 in the southern hemisphere. The GPS position is transferred independently of whether the GPS positioning has been activated or deactivated in your vehicle via the settings menu.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.name: Vehicle position – degree of longitude
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.description:
This value indicates the degree of longitude at which the vehicle was at the time of data collection. 
The degree of longitude could range from 0 (at the Greenwich meridian / Great Britain) to a maximum of +180 east or respectively -180 west of the meridian. The GPS position is transferred independently of whether the GPS positioning has been activated or deactivated in your vehicle via the settings menu.

vehicle.vehicle.averageWeeklyDistanceSho.name: Average distance per week
vehicle.vehicle.averageWeeklyDistanceSho.description: This indicates the average volume of the distance travelled in kilometres or miles per week.
vehicle.vehicle.averageWeeklyDistanceSho.range:
1 km to 3000 km
or
1 mi to 1864 mi

vehicle.vehicle.averageWeeklyDistanceLon.name: Average distance per week (long-life)
vehicle.vehicle.averageWeeklyDistanceLon.description: This value indicates the weekly average travelled in kilometres or miles over a period of 2 months.
vehicle.vehicle.averageWeeklyDistanceLon.range:
1 km to 3000 km
or
1 mi to 1864 mi

vehicle.drivetrain.lastRemainingRange.name: Last sent remaining range
vehicle.drivetrain.lastRemainingRange.description: Last sent remaining range electric + fuel sent by the vehicle. Range from vehicle Kombi (Queried for PHEV and CE vehicles). Delivers e-range + ce range for PHEV. Ce Range for CE vehicles. Likely 0 for BEV vehicles. This value should only be used for combustion cars. Electric cars should read Vehicle.Drivetrain.ElectricEngine.KombiRemainingElectricRange.

vehicle.vehicle.speedRange.lowerBound.name: Speed range lower
vehicle.vehicle.speedRange.lowerBound.description: Lower bound of the speed range in km/h. The Range includes the lower bound. Due to privacy reasons some functions are not allowed to transmit the current driving speed and should use the SpeedRange attribute.

vehicle.vehicle.speedRange.upperBound.name: Speed range upper
vehicle.vehicle.speedRange.upperBound.description: Upper bound of the speed range in km/h. The Range excludes the upper bound. Due to privacy reasons some functions are not allowed to transmit the current driving speed and should use the SpeedRange attribute.

vehicle.channel.teleservice.lastAutomati.name: Automatic Teleservice Call
vehicle.channel.teleservice.lastAutomati.description: This value indicates at what time an Automatic Service Call (ASC) was initiated by the vehicle.
vehicle.channel.teleservice.lastAutomati.range:
dd.mm.yyyy hh:mm UTC
or
mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm UTC

vehicle.channel.teleservice.lastTeleserv.name: Teleservice report
vehicle.channel.teleservice.lastTeleserv.description: This value indicates at what time the teleservice report call was initiated by the vehicle. The vehicle collects measured values or error data for the teleservice report call, and automatically sends them according to defined cycles.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.name: "Smart Charging" option
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value indicates which “Smart Charging” option is being used to charge with.

vehicle.electricalSystem.battery48V.stat.name: 48V battery state of health
vehicle.electricalSystem.battery48V.stat.description: SoH (State of Health) of the 48V Battery that is shown to the customer. Created to fulfill EU Battery Regulation.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: AC charging current
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description:
This value indicates the maximum charging current for the most recent charging process in ampere (A) (only when charging with alternating current). 
Values between 0 and 25 are possible. Both the vehicle and charging station could be individually charged with a certain maximum charging current. The value displayed here is the greater of these two figures.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: AC charging current limit and selection
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description:
The first value indicates whether the charging current used to charge the vehicle is limited. 

The second value describes the type of limit (reduced or minimum).
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.range: NOTCHOSEN, CHOSEN, INVALID; MAXCHARGING, REDUCEDCHARGING, MINCHARGING, INVALID

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: AC charging restriction factor
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Response of ac restriction.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: AC charging voltage
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description:
This value indicates the charging voltage for the most recent charging process (only when charging with alternating current). 
This value is usually in the region of 230 V. 
However, charging voltages may range from 0 to 300.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.name: Acoustic limitation of charging process
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value indicates whether charging is limited due to noise emissions.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.name: Activation period for ECO mode during most recent drive
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.description:
Indicates the length of time for which ECO mode was activated during the most recent drive when data were recorded. 
The values range from 0 to 100.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.name: Activation period for ECO PLUS mode during most recent drive
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.description:
Indicates the length of time for which ECO PLUS mode was activated during the most recent drive when data were recorded. 
The values range from 0 to 100.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.prec.name: Automatic preconditioning status feedback
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.prec.description: Current state of toggle switch for automatic battery preconditioning. ON means automatic mode (navigation based) of the predictive thermal management (vWM) is activated. OFF means automatic mode (navigation based) of the predictive thermal management (vWM) is deactivated. TEMP_OFF stands for temporary deactivation for current trip of the automatic predictive thermal management.

vehicle.vehicle.avgAuxPower.name: Auxiliary user power (power consumption of electrical components)
vehicle.vehicle.avgAuxPower.description: This value indicates the power of the auxiliary users in kW at the time of data collection. This is the on-board power consumption including the power for the air conditioning.

vehicle.drivetrain.avgElectricRangeConsu.name: Average electric consumption
vehicle.drivetrain.avgElectricRangeConsu.description:
This value indicates the average electric consumption in [kWh/100 km or mi/kWh] at the time of data collection. 
Note: Not available for the models i3 and i8.
vehicle.drivetrain.avgElectricRangeConsu.range:
0 kWh/100 km to 100 kWh/100 km
or
0,6213 mi/kWh to 62,1371 mi/kWh

vehicle.vehicle.avgSpeed.name: Average speed
vehicle.vehicle.avgSpeed.description: The value indicates the average speed driven by the vehicle in km/h or mph at the time of data collection.
vehicle.vehicle.avgSpeed.range:
0 km/h to 
300 km/h
or
0 mph to 186 mph,
INVALID

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port any position flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port any position flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port any position plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the charging port.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port front left flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the front left flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port front left flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if front left charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port front left plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the front left charging port.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port front middle flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the front middle flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port front middle flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if front middle charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port front middle plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the front middle charging port.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port front right flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the front right flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port front right flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if front right charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port front right plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the front right charging port.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port rear left flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the rear left flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port rear left flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if rear left charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port rear left plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the rear left charging port.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port rear middle flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the rear middle flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port rear middle flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if rear middle charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port rear middle plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the rear middle charging port.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port rear right flap automatic open/close
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This field indicates if customer setting for opening the rear right flap by myWay function (slider in the mobile app) is active. If true, flap opens automatically when the vehicle is close to a charging station with the digital key in the pocket and closes automatically after unplugging the cable.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port rear right flap open
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if rear right charging port is open in the vehicle.

vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.name: Battery charging port rear right plugged
vehicle.powertrain.tractionBattery.charg.description: This signal indicates, if a charging cable is plugged in the rear right charging port.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Calculated remaining charging time of the high-voltage battery
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the calculated time (in minutes) until the high-voltage battery is fully charged. If a navigation destination has been set, the time remaining until reaching the destination will be displayed.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging authentication status
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Plug & Charge (Automatic Payment of Charging Services) authorization status of a charging session. "AUTHORIZATION_SUCCESSFUL" - Authentication with PlugAndCharge successful, "TRANSPORT_LAYER_ERROR" - TLS connection to EVSE not possible, "HIGH_LEVEL_COMMUNICATION_ERROR" - High Level communication with ISO15118 error, "CONTRACT_SERVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR" - EVSE doesn't support Authentication via PlugAndCharge, "AUTHORIZATION_TIMEOUT" - Authorization run in an error, "AUTHORIZATION_TIMEOUT" - authentication not finished after 120s, "NVM_READ_CERTIFICATE_ERROR" - Certificates couldn't be red from Charging Control Unit storrage, "CERTIFICATE_UPDATE_ERROR" - update of contract via powerline failed, "XML_SECURITY_ERROR" - Schema validation error of transfered data.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.range: AUTHORIZATION_SUCCESSFUL, TRANSPORT_LAYER_ERROR, HIGH_LEVEL_COMMUNICATION_ERROR, CONTRACT_SERVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR, AUTHORIZATION_ERROR, AUTHORIZATION_TIMEOUT, NVM_READ_CERTIFICATE_ERROR, CERTIFICATE_UPDATE_ERROR, XML_SECURITY_ERROR

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging connector status
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Current condition of charging plug across all types (inductive, conductive), modes (AC, DC) and service packs.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.name: Charging current limit
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value indicates the set limit of the charging current in amperes (A).

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging method and plug type
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description:
This value describes whether the vehicle was charged with direct current (DC) or alternating current (AC) and which charging plug was used for this purpose. 
The indicated technical value AC_TYPE1PLUG, for example, indicates that the high-voltage battery was charged in alternating current mode, making use of a charging plug of Type 1.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging mode
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Current charging mode.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging mode deviation
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This parameter contains the information of deviation to the customer selected charging mode due to system reasons.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.range: NO_DEVIATION, DC_DYNAMIC_MALIBU, DC_DYNAMIC_MIN_SOE_PROTECTION, IMMEDIATE_CHARGING_NOT_SUPPORTED_BY_EVSE, IMMEDIATE_CHARGING_WAKE_UP_LIMIT_REACHED, IMMEDIATE_CHARGING, CHARGING_TIMESLOT, CHARGING_IN_TIMESLOT, SMART_CHARGING, DC_DYNAMIC, BIDIRECTIONAL_CHARGING, NO_ACTION, UNKNOWN

vehicle.body.chargingPort.plugEventId.name: Charging port plug event ID
vehicle.body.chargingPort.plugEventId.description: Unique identifier which increases each time the customer plugs in his electrified vehicle (EXCEPT if the time between unplug and plug-in is less than 90 seconds). This value should be unique for each charging session. See ElectricEngine.Charging.PlugStatus.

vehicle.body.chargingPort.statusClearTex.name: Charging port status text
vehicle.body.chargingPort.statusClearTex.description: Required alongside Vehicle.Body.ChargingPort.Status to ensure correct handling of charging sessions for G08 BEV vehicles (for details, contact DE-3-E; onboard fix expected by 2021-03)

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.name: Charging power
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: The current charging power in Watt. This value should only be considered with respect to the current timestamp.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging process of the high-voltage battery (inductive/conductive)
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the charging process (CONDUCTIVE/INDUCTIVE) used to charge the vehicle at the time of data collection.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging process of the high-voltage battery (phases)
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the number of phases in which the high-voltage battery will be charged.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging profile preference
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Charging preference of current charging profile. This value depends on charge mode selection. For Vehicle.ElectricEngine.Charging.Profile.Mode being "DELAYED_CHARGING", Vehicle.ElectricEngine.Charging.Profile.Preference is either "SMART_CHARGING" or "CHARGING_WINDOW". In case Vehicle.ElectricEngine.Charging.Profile.Mode is "IMMEDIATE_CHARGING", Vehicle.ElectricEngine.Charging.Profile.Preference is set to "NO_PRESELECTION".

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging status
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description:
This value indicates the current charging status of the vehicle at the time of data collection. 
For example, NOCHARGING means that the vehicle's high-voltage battery is currently not being charged. 
INITIALIZATION means that the charging process is just being prepared, while CHARGINGACTIVE means that the battery is just being charged. 
Other possible values are: 
CHARGINGPAUSED (charging paused), 
CHARGINGENDED (charging ended) and 
CHARGINGERROR (charging error).

vehicle.trip.segment.end.drivetrain.batt.name: Charging status of battery
vehicle.trip.segment.end.drivetrain.batt.description: This value indicates the charging status of the high-voltage battery at the end of the most recently logged drive (in percentage).

vehicle.drivetrain.batteryManagement.hea.name: Charging status of high-voltage battery
vehicle.drivetrain.batteryManagement.hea.description: This value indicates the current charging status of the vehicle at the time of data collection.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.chargingDura.name: Charging time display
vehicle.powertrain.electric.chargingDura.description: This value indicates whether the charging time is displayed in the vehicle.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging timer type
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Charging profile timer type (e.g., Weekdays or TwoTimesTimer)

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Charging window selection
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description:
Indicates a pre-defined time window in which the high-voltage battery of the vehicle should be charged. 
The value could be either NOTCHOSEN or CHOSEN.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Climatization active
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Climatization Activation of Vehicle in Charging Profile, vehicle interior gets preconditioned for next departure time.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.departureTim.name: Departure time display
vehicle.powertrain.electric.departureTim.description: This value indicates whether the departure time is displayed in the vehicle.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Departure time relevant
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Information if the upcoming departure time is relevant for the professional mode (bidirectional/unidirectional) and the target state of energy shall be reached at this time.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Discharge allowed
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Allowing discharging in professional mode for the bidirectional power transfer function (BPT) is selected from customer or not (ON/OFF).

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.acceler.name: Driving style evaluation - 'acceleration behaviour'
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.acceler.description:
This value indicates the number of stars which the driving style analysis has given to the acceleration behaviour of the driver at the time of data collection. 
The system allocates 0 to 5 stars.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.chassis.name: Driving style evaluation - 'pro-active driving'
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.chassis.description:
This value indicates the number of stars which the driving style analysis has given to the 'pro-active driving' behaviour of the driver at the time of data collection. 
The system allocates 0 to 5 stars.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.name: Electrical energy consumption in COMFORT mode during the most recent drive
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.description: This indicates the electrical energy consumption (kWh) in COMFORT mode, measured at the time of data collection.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.name: Electrically driven distance during the most recent drive
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.description: This value indicates the distance covered with electrical energy during the most recent drive in percentage.

vehicle.drivetrain.batteryManagement.max.name: Energy content of the high-voltage battery
vehicle.drivetrain.batteryManagement.max.description: This value indicates the current energy content of the high-voltage battery.

vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.name: Energy recuperated during the last drive
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.description: This value indicates the average electrical energy in kilowatt hours (kWh/100 km or kWh/62 mi) recuperated during the last logged drive per 100 kilometres or 62 miles. The values range from 0 to 254.
vehicle.trip.segment.accumulated.drivetr.range:
0 kWh/100 km to 170 kWh/100 km
or
0 kWh/62 mi to 170 kWh/62 mi

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Energy required until high-voltage battery fully charged
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the amount of energy required to fully charge the battery.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.remain.name: Estimate of electric range during charging
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.remain.description: This value indicates the electric range predicted during charging.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Estimate of remaining charging time
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the estimated remaining charging time in minutes.

vehicle.drivetrain.totalRemainingRange.name: Estimate of total range during charging
vehicle.drivetrain.totalRemainingRange.description: This value indicates the total range predicted during charging (total of electric range and combustion engine range).

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: HV charging system status
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Charging HV Status.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.range: INVALID, CHARGING, ERROR, NOT_CHARGING, WAITING_FOR_CHARGING, FINISHED_FULLY_CHARGED, FINISHED_NOT_FULL

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Immediate charging system reason
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This parameter contains the information that customer selected charging mode is overwritten due to system reasons.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Instant charging function status
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates whether the “instant charging” function is activated.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Last charging reason
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Reason of the last charging process.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.range: CHARGING_GOAL_REACHED, END_REQUESTED_BY_DRIVER, CONNECTOR_REMOVED, POWERGRID_FAILED, HV_SYSTEM_FAILURE, CHARGING_STATION_FAILURE, PARKING_LOCK_FAILED, NO_PARKING_LOCK, INVALID, -NA-

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Last charging result
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Result of the last charging process.

vehicle.body.chargingPort.isHospitalityA.name: Locking status of charging plug after charging complete
vehicle.body.chargingPort.isHospitalityA.description: This value indicates whether the charging plug is automatically unlocked (HOSPITALITY_ACTIVE) or remains locked (HOSPITALITY_INACTIVE) after charging is completed.

vehicle.body.flap.isPermanentlyUnlocked.name: Locking status of the charging flap
vehicle.body.flap.isPermanentlyUnlocked.description: This value indicates whether the charging flap is locked independently of the central locking at the time of data collection.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.prec.name: Manual preconditioning status feedback
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.prec.description: Current state of button for manual battery preconditioning. Either for charging or driving.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.name: Maximum charging current
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value indicates the maximum available charging current, independently of the infrastructure and selected cable.

vehicle.trip.segment.end.travelledDistan.name: Mileage after last drive
vehicle.trip.segment.end.travelledDistan.description: This value indicates the total mileage after the last drive logged.
vehicle.trip.segment.end.travelledDistan.range:
0 km to 999999 km
or
0 mi to 621371 mi

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.name: Minimum charging current
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value indicates the minimum available charging current, independently of the infrastructure and selected cable.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.prec.name: Preconditioning state
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.prec.description: Status of battery preconditioning activity. On legacy value only valid for legacy-project SP2021plus.
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.prec.range: OFF, ON_LEGACY, MANUAL_ON_CHARGE, AUTOMATIC_ON, REMOTE_ON_CHARGE, REMOTE_ON_DRIVE, REMOTE_OFF, UNKNOWN

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: RCP config complete
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Vehicles with a complete RCP (Remote Charging Profile) Configuration explicitly send values for all charging profile attributes. For Vehicles without a complete RCP Configuration, some defaults are applied.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Reason charging ended
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Reason for the end of charging, from SP25 on.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.range: NO_CHARGING_END_SINCE_IPF_WAKEUP, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_HMI_UNPLUG_CABLE_ONCE, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_HMI_CHARGING_TARGET_REACHED, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_APP_UNPLUG_CABLE_ONCE, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_APP_CHARGING_TARGET_REACHED, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_CHARGING_STOP_VIA_CHARGING_STOP_BUTTON_SOCKET, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_AC_CHARGING_STOP_VIA_KEY, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_AC_CHARGING_STOP_WALLBOX, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_AC_CHARGING_STOP_LATCH, HV_BATTERY_FULLY_CHARGED, INFRASTRUCTURE_PHYSICAL_LIMITS_REACHED_TARGET_SOE_NOT_REACHABLE, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_EVSE_SHUTDOWN, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_GBT_CST_MESSAGE, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_STATIC_PILOT, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_COMMUNICATION_ERROR_FAILED_RESPONSE_CODE, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_COMMUNICATION_ERROR, INFRASTRUCTURE_NO_ENERGY_TRANSFER, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_PRECHARGE_ERROR, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_CCS_EVSE_MALFUNCTION_EMERGENCY_SHUTDOWN, INFRASTRUCTURE_STATION_NOT_COMPATIBLE, INFRASTRUCTURE_CHARGE_READINESS_TIMEOUT, INFRASTRUCTURE_AC_MAXIMUM_GRID_ERROR_REACHED, INFRASTRUCTURE_DC_GBT_ISOLATION_ERROR_DETECTED, INFRASTRUCTURE_AUTHENTIFICATION_ERROR, VEHICLE_HV_BATTERY_ERROR, VEHICLE_HV_BATTERY_COMMUNICATION_ERROR, VEHICLE_DCDC_ERROR, VEHICLE_PLC_BOOTUP_ERROR, VEHICLE_HV_BATTERY_MAXIMAL_CURRENT_OVERSHOOT, VEHICLE_ISOLATION_ERROR, VEHICLE_MAXIMUM_TEMPERATURE_CHARGING_SOCKET_OVERSHOOT, VEHICLE_LT3_OVERSHOOT, VEHICLE_FUSI_CABLE_LOCK_ERROR, VEHICLE_PLC_COMMUNICATION_NOT_POSSIBLE, FLEXCHARGER_GRID_ERROR, FLEXCHARGER_GRID_TEMPERATURE_ERROR, FLEXCHARGER_EVSE_TEMPERATURE_ERROR, FLEXCHARGER_EVSE_INTERNAL_ERROR, FLEXCHARGER_AC_DC_FAULT_CURRENT, FLEXCHARGER_INCORRECT_REACTION_TIME_PWM, FLEXCHARGER_CHARGING_CURRENT_TOO_HIGH, FLEXCHARGER_PE_FAULT, INFRASTRUCTURE_INEFFICIENT_CHARGING_LOW_POWER, VEHICLE_CABLE_LOCKING_ERROR, VEHICLE_CONFIGURATION_ERROR_400V_800V, INFRASTRUCTURE_NO_AC_VOLTAGE, PLUG_AND_CHARGE_TLS_ERROR, PLUG_AND_CHARGE_CONTRACT_ERROR, SMART_CHARGING_TARIFF_SELECTION_INVALID, SMART_CHARGING_CHARGING_PROFILE_INVALID, CUSTOMER_INTERACTION_AC_CHARGING_STOP_VIA_APP, CHARGING_PAUSED, DISCHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE_VOLTAGE_TOO_HIGH, DISCHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE_SOE_TOO_LOW, DISCHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE_INTERNAL_ERROR, DISCHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE_INCOMPATIBLE_ADAPTER, DISCHARGE_NOT_POSSIBLE_INCOMPATIBLE_CONSUMER

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Reason for ending a charging process
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the reason why a charging process was ended.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.range: UNKNOWN, CHARGING_GOAL_REACHED, END_REQUESTED_BY_DRIVER, CONNECTOR_REMOVED, POWERGRID_FAILED, HV_SYSTEM_FAILURE, CHARGING_STATION_FAILURE, PARKING_LOCK_FAILED, NO_PARKING_LOCK, SIGNAL_INVALID, INVALID

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.kombiR.name: Remaining electric range in km or mi
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.kombiR.description: This value indicates the remaining electric range at the time of data collection.
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.kombiR.range:
0 km to 4000 km
or
0 mi to 2485 mi,
INVALID

vehicle.powertrain.electric.range.target.name: Remaining electric range, depending on target charging status
vehicle.powertrain.electric.range.target.description: This value indicates the remaining electric range at the time of data collection. This depends on the set target value of the charging status.

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Route optimized charging status
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: Indicates the charging status in cases where e-route charging is used by the customer for his journey. E-route charging sessions have two distinct phases. Route optimzed charging sessions override the customer target state of charge temporarily.

vehicle.body.flap.isLocked.name: Status of charging flap
vehicle.body.flap.isLocked.description: This value indicates whether the charging flap is locked at the time of data collection.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.name: Status of charging limit
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.char.description: This value indicates whether a charging current limit was active at the time of data collection.

vehicle.body.chargingPort.status.name: Status of charging plug
vehicle.body.chargingPort.status.description: This value indicates whether the vehicle was connected to a charging plug at the time of data collection (CONNECTED) or not (DISCONNECTED).

vehicle.body.chargingPort.dcStatus.name: Status of charging plug (DC only)
vehicle.body.chargingPort.dcStatus.description: This value indicates whether the vehicle was connected to a DC charging plug at the time of data collection (CONNECTED) or not (DISCONNECTED).

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.name: Target charging status of the high-voltage battery
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.description: This value indicates the target charging status of the high-voltage battery in percent. This is displayed in 10% increments.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.name: Target min state of charge
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.description: Min target state of charge requested by customer for smart charging and V2X.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.name: Target SOC for professional mode
vehicle.powertrain.electric.battery.stat.description: Contains the target state of charge that shall be used as target in professional mode. At least this target state of charge will be reached by departure time.

vehicle.trip.segment.end.time.name: Time of most recent drive
vehicle.trip.segment.end.time.description: The time stamp contains the date and local time of the most recently logged and transmitted drive, for example 15.05.2017 15:51:00 UTC or 05/15/2017 15:51:00 UTC.
vehicle.trip.segment.end.time.range:
dd.mm.yyyy hh:mm:ss UTC
or
mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss UTC

vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.name: Total mains energy supplied to the vehicle (PHEV only)
vehicle.drivetrain.electricEngine.chargi.description: This value indicates the total energy supplied using charging cables.

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.overwriteTi.name: Climate timer overwrite action
vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.overwriteTi.description: Timer State/Action with states Activate (On), Deactivate (Off) and NoAction (Only used when communicating timer to the vehicle).

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.overwriteTi.name: Climate timer overwrite hour
vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.overwriteTi.description: Hour setting of climate timer as per vehicle-configured timezone.

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.overwriteTi.name: Climate timer overwrite minute
vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.overwriteTi.description: Minute setting of climate timer as per vehicle-configured timezone.

vehicle.powertrain.electric.range.displa.name: Electric range display control
vehicle.powertrain.electric.range.displa.description: Indicates if and how the electric range shall be displayed in the vehicle.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.hmi.distanceU.name: Infotainment distance unit
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.hmi.distanceU.description: Distance unit used in the current HMI

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.name: Navigation fix status
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.description: GPS fix status. "NO_FIX" means when less than 3 satellites are found. "2D_GPS_FIX" is obtained when at least 3 satellites are found. "3D_GPS_FIX" is obtained when at least 4 satellites are found.

vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.name: Navigation satellite count
vehicle.cabin.infotainment.navigation.cu.description: Number of GPS satellites used for positioning and relates to the reliability of the positioning.

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.name: Weekday timer 1 action
vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.description: Timer 1 State/Action with states Activate (On), Deactivate (Off) and NoAction (Only used when communicating timer 1 to the vehicle).

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.name: Weekday timer 1 hour
vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.description: Hour setting of climate timer 1 as per vehicle-configured timezone.

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.name: Weekday timer 1 minute
vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.description: Minute setting of climate timer 1 as per vehicle-configured timezone.

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.name: Weekday timer 2 action
vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.description: Timer 2 State/Action with states Activate (On), Deactivate (Off) and NoAction (Only used when communicating timer 2 to the vehicle).

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.name: Weekday timer 2 hour
vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.description: Hour setting of climate timer 2 as per vehicle-configured timezone.

vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.name: Weekday timer 2 minute
vehicle.cabin.climate.timers.weekdaysTim.description: Minute setting of climate timer 2 as per vehicle-configured timezone.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.left.tir.name: Measured tyre pressure, front left
vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.left.tir.description: This value indicates the measured tyre pressure on the front left in kPa

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.right.ti.name: Measured tyre pressure, front right
vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.right.ti.description: This value indicates the measured tyre pressure on the front right in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.left.tir.name: Measured tyre pressure, rear left
vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.left.tir.description: This value indicates the measured tyre pressure on the rear left in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.right.ti.name: Measured tyre pressure, rear right
vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.right.ti.description: This value indicates the measured tyre pressure on the rear right in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.left.tir.name: Target tyre pressure, front left
vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.left.tir.description: This value indicates the target tyre pressure on the front left in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.right.ti.name: Target tyre pressure, front right
vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.right.ti.description: This value indicates the target tyre pressure on the front right in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.left.tir.name: Target tyre pressure, rear left
vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.left.tir.description: This value indicates the target tyre pressure on the rear left in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.right.ti.name: Target tyre pressure, rear right
vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.right.ti.description: This value indicates the target tyre pressure on the rear right in kPa.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.left.tir.name: Tire temperature in Celsius, front left
vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.left.tir.description: Tire temperature in Celsius on the front left.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.right.ti.name: Tire temperature in Celsius, front right
vehicle.chassis.axle.row1.wheel.right.ti.description: Tire temperature in Celsius on the front right.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.left.tir.name: Tire temperature in Celsius, rear left
vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.left.tir.description: Tire temperature in Celsius on the rear left.

vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.right.ti.name: Tire temperature in Celsius, rear right
vehicle.chassis.axle.row2.wheel.right.ti.description: Tire temperature in Celsius on the rear right.
